text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly lists and defines the Tag-along (Co-sale) Right under section A3, stating: 'In the event that one or more Shareholders (the \u201cSelling Shareholders\u201d) propose to transfer Shares to a third party (the \u201cTransferee\u201d) constituting more than 10 % of the share capital, the Investor shall have the right, exercisable within 10 business days of receipt of the notice, to sell all (or a pro-rata portion of) its Shares on the same price and terms.' This perfectly matches the criterion's requirement to define the Tag-Along right as ensuring the investor can sell a pro rata portion of shares alongside the founders on the same terms.", "criterion_id": "32a99ce4-2e4a-42d1-bf72-6db07c939b16"}
